lenders.name: Scott & Marilyn

lenders.name: Wendy & Paul

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an Insurance broker helping construction companies obtain insurance for their construction projects all over the USA.  My husband is a high school history teacher and football coach.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to reach out from my home and share with others. I believe in people, their hopes and their dreams to build stronger families and communities.

lenders.name: Chris, Tracy, Carson & Keaton

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because:
I can! 
– I believe it is important to help people whenever whereever you can, if you capable of it. So I want to share my good fortune with people less fortunate, and by doing so, I hope to make a small (or even better a big) difference for someone who wants to change her/his life for the better! (-:

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a difference

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I was formerly in Peace Corps and have seen poverty and believe in what can be accomplished by individuals who receive small amounts of assistance.

lenders.name: Jose Arturo
lenders.loan_because: I´m also an entrepreneur, have and had business and understand the problem that is getting founds to start or upgrade your business.
lenders.occupational_info:
I´m a Software Engineer as main job and a entrepreneur in my free time. I have had cyber-coffe, video-club, now I have video game machines installed in grocery stores in Monterrey, I give 40% of the income as comition to the store owner helping booth business to be profitable.

I´m also a member in the bux.to community, and I get paid for viewing advertising. Visit bux-to-mty.blogspot.com for more info.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It's part of being a good world citizen.

lenders.loan_because: I think that people don't come to this world with an equal chance to be happy and have a good life quality and that's why we should help each other.

lenders.name: Roni
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone a hand up not a hand out.  I believe everyone deserves a chance and third world countries and people who live there don"t have the same opportunites that I received so I would like to help someone and give back some of the opportunites that helped me to help myself.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want others to succeed

lenders.name: Vikas
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people, rather than giving them a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a student at the University of Western Ontario and currently in my 4th year. I am really amazed by the power of microcredit in the field of poverty alleviation. Please help support endeavors that help people help themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I want to see women of the world succeed!

lenders.name: Dave and Kim

lenders.name: Jamie

lenders.occupational_info: Getting older & falling apart...BUT...I'm still vertical! LOL I'm working towards my BS in Psychology, only got 2.5 years to go! Yay me!! Better late than never I say!

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired. I prepared taxes and managed money for others

lenders.name: Sue

lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, but I used to work in the arts, planning and promoting classical concerts.

lenders.occupational_info: I help research doctors fiscally manage their grants.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: It really makes me feel good to help other people.  I saw this as a great way to help someone out.  I love this because it really is a gift that can keep on giving.  As people pay off their loans, I can reinvest the money in the future of a new person.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked at a bank for the last eleven years.

Kim
lenders.loan_because: I can; I am blessed to be able to help someone who needs it!
lenders.occupational_info: I just left a job as a newspaper photographer and am currently working at a photography studio that does portraiture and wedding photography. lenders.loan_because: it seems to be helpful.  Though thankful for my many blessings, I feel saddened and powerless at the intense greed of people; Of governments and corporations...  Let's put humankinds' effort toward interaction and peace.  This I hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying the history of Art - all kinds of Art!  I hope to work in museums and teach about the art of different cultures.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed that I have so much in life.  I hope that I can assist others in improving their lives and those around them.

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: Throughout my life, help has appeared when I needed it most, be it money, advice, emotional support, or a hand up in business. Now I am in a position to be that hand up for someone else. It is enormously gratifying to know that my little loans make a difference: a perfect example of how even a small act of kindness can ripple through the lives of many people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on a computer to make artwork. I look carefully at documents to make them look their best. My art helps people understand words better.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Debra Jo
lenders.loan_because: It's not all about me. Because it is a way to see unity not segregation. Because I have been helped before and it can make a difference. Because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I tattoo eyebrows or eye color or lip color on your face so it is permanently there. Sometimes I do this and make it look nature. If your face is different because of an accident and now your lips are not straight we can make them appear that way with skin tone colors.  It is called corrective pigment camouflage, CPM, and you can use this technique if you have survived being burned or if you have Vitaligo, or alopecia. (Genetic hypo-pigmentation or hair loss diseases.)  It can give continuity to skin and appearances. I also work with scars and many other traits. The work is SO rewarding. All I do is tattoo the outside and I get to be a piece of watching the inside heal! What a great position to be in. I wouldn't do anything else!

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great organization, and the work they do directly helps many people on a daily basis.

lenders.name: Annette

I pray God's best for the people who are giving and receiving through this website.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working doing Business Development for a government supply company.

lenders.name: Jess

lenders.name: Karon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in order to recieve you have to give first, and everyone needs a helping hand sometime in their life. lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do & the Kiva idea is really innovative

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Global economic inequality is the greatest problem facing humanity today. Over 4 billion people live in abject poverty while the remaining 1/7th of the population pollute and use up resources at over 40 times the rate of their counterparts. There can be no peace until this inequality is addressed and corrected. Kiva offers an easy way for all of us to contribute towards the solution. After all, the greatest investment one can make is in your fellow man.

lenders.loan_because: Giving back puts a smile on my face. Helping  people in this global world and economy just makes sense. Are you a Giver or is it "all about you"?
lenders.occupational_info: Get outside in nature! Connect with others, make memories and enjoy life.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.loan_because: Together we can change this world for the better.

lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations creating training materials and deliver those materials or content to employees.

lenders.loan_because: I've been so very fortunate and I want to pay it forward.

lenders.loan_because: I want my friends to enjoy life

lenders.loan_because: It is great to be able to help someone achieve one of their goals!

lenders.loan_because: I wish to change the world

lenders.name: Sam

lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate lawyer and help people buy,sell and mortgage property for businesses and families

Sally - I am a development director for a student organization.  I raise funds in various ways to make a difference in students' campus lives.

lenders.name: Tay
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand at one time or another whether it is money or your time. If you are in a position to help it is your responsibility to the human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a Creative Department and I am responsible for printing and web development

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people realize their dreams, who would otherwise not have an opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide access to boats to those who cannot justify purchasing one on their own. I am currently a student of International Business.

lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good!

lenders.name: Sheri

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the best way to help others is to give them the tools to help themselves.

lenders.name: Robb
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.  Someone took a chance on me and loaned me money to start my business and now it is my turn to pay it forward.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I am an amateur motorcycle mechanic and otherwise just getting by.

lenders.name: Mark Strode & Family

lenders.name: Harkins Family
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It is very exiciting to see what a small amount of money can do to help families across the world. Running a business to support your family takes passion, drive and lots of hard work and I am grateful to be able to help people achive their personal goals.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: "So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth."  - Baha'u'llah

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women around the world, who in turn will help everyone.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it is a moral imperative.
lenders.occupational_info: Management consulting and investments

lenders.name: Signe
lenders.loan_because: someone made me a small loan once upon a time, and it made a big difference in my life.  Now it's my turn to do the same for others.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: people need capital
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home assisting other businesses with their computer systems

lenders.name: CYNTHIA
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I give medical advice on the telephone.

lenders.name: BONNIE
lenders.loan_because: I've been so blessed in my life, (just by where I was born and to whom I was born ), that I feel that it is both my duty and my pleasure to share with others.  I particularly like to loan to women in other countries since they are usually not as fortunate as American women are.  In addition, it's been proven that helping women helps their families and their communities.  Not only that, it feels amazing!

lenders.name: Bisma
lenders.loan_because: I feel being fortunate myself, it is my duty to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a business and understand that working captial is important for a successful buisness.

lenders.name: B Marden
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I want people to know economic freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: Difficult but not impossible.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.occupation: Principal and Senior Consultant at Actuarial Firm

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I own my own business. I know the struggle and difficulty of trying to obtain working capital and loans. For the people that these loans go to, it may be near impossible. I want to give these people the oppertunities that I had to create a business of their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide family entertainment to corporations, schools and churches.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Every human deserves a shot at making their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with children every day is the greatest job on the planet!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help those who are trying to make a living but are having a hard time due to various circumstances in their life. To give a person a break in life is a wonderful gift and one that I am grateful to be able to give.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: The idea of microfinance support for local market-based entrepreneurship is critical to raising world wide standards of living.  Small is beautiful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses become more successful.

lenders.name: King Theo
lenders.loan_because: Im a lover and a barker.
lenders.occupational_info: I remind people to love... me.

lenders.name: Pem
lenders.occupation: Development Associate at NARAL Pro-Choice MA
lenders.loan_because: microcredit can change lives.

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all connected and interdependent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who designs for prints and the internet..

lenders.name: Jasmine & Brad
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in need, people who were not born into our circumstances but born into poverty.  Many people in our lives have believed in us and supported us.  We want to share some of that support & hope to help make a positive difference in someone's life.  Our country, the U.S. has so much more & so much excess, material excess, that we do not need, how can we not give, how can we not share?  And how AWESOME is it, that instead of going to a movie or dining out, or buying a new gadget we DO NOT NEED, we can give $25.00 and change someone's life!  =)

lenders.name: Reneida
lenders.loan_because: It's more than just donating. It is giving somebody the opportunity to progress and improve his or her life not just once, but many times over.

lenders.name: Shelby
lenders.loan_because: I love helping out people!

lenders.name: Jeni
lenders.occupational_info: I am in commercial real estate managment.

lenders.name: Brian & Daungnate
lenders.loan_because: I love the microloan concept and how Kiva has found a way to use web technology for something so positive.  We can all participate and make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage software development projects.

lenders.name: Renay
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I'm helping someone to better their life.

lenders.name: Paul Marlisa
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Support other people when they are sick.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: We're all one.

lenders.name: Lindzel
lenders.loan_because: I understand that I've been a very, very fortunate girl and that not everyone is as well taken care of.

lenders.name: Rob W
lenders.loan_because: I take a long term view of the world but have only a short lifetime to make some difference.

lenders.name: Siv
lenders.loan_because: it is a small way to repay the people who have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: I build treatment plants to treat and remediate contaminated water and soils.

lenders.name: SC
lenders.loan_because: I believe in it!
lenders.occupational_info: I help my company sell patient monitoring solutions to hospitals.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: There is need.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a quality inspector in a wire factory.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: You can really see the impact your loan has on an individual basis...and it feels good to help people work toward their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and direct for TV.  I spend a lot of time behind a computer using my imagination.  When I'm not working I spend as much time as I can with my family.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because:
I am not claiming to be an expert, nor do I have all the answers. I am claiming to share what I know, to be in your corner, to be a friend, to help you, to guide you, to listen to you, to learn from you, and to  experience a life full of abundance with you. One day at a time!

GOD BLESS!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a widower and really enjoy internet marketing. I consider what I do A labor of love.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: my small loan makes a huge difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I recieve so much love and sharing from my community, I want to return  that love and pass it on to others . It completes the circle of giving and recieiving . I believe we are all one and together we can heal our world with love and joy!  I am so amazed with all the wonderful beings trying to make a difference in their lives. I am so blessed I can give back and share with others so they can live their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: The work I am doing is to promote God first... After working in the capital world for 37 plus years I am now living quietly in the priviate sector, and beginning to rise to my calling. Giving back and helping others to build a positive life with God first and loving one another. its time for all faiths to come together for the purpose of peace and learning from one another. God Bless Kat

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should be able to follow a dream and we are all people just trying to make a life

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I now see that borrowers are diligent in repaying their loans, and my original loans can be re-loaned many times, making the impact even larger. My focus in making loans is now the USA.
lenders.occupational_info: My formal training is in human nutrition, and I've worked as a dietitian for over 20 years. I now divide my time between wellness coaching and speaking. My passion is public speaking, and I coach speakers to "find their voice" and communicate better.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe we need to share with the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work extensively with my church since I've retired.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I purchase chemicals and packaging used to make hair shampoo.

lenders.name: Ann Elise & Dan
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to give back to the world more than I have taken.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the pleasure of spending my workday teaching children everything from dividing by a 2-digit divisor to our solar system to the first colonists of America to the unlocking the exciting world of reading.  I'm so lucky!

lenders.name: Thad
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Roemer
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Josephine
lenders.loan_because: Our family is very blessed and lucky and we just want to share what we can.

lenders.name: caroline and bill

lenders.occupational_info: Caroline works on legal issues related to banks and lending money. Bill works in video game development.

lenders.name: kristen
lenders.loan_because: this is the best way to make a lasting difference and it makes you feel good!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the government helping juvenile delinquents and abused and negelected children.

lenders.loan_because: I loan because it makes me feel good to help improve families' lives.  My Papa funds my suggestions as he wants to be a partner in building things; people, business, the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a little girl growing up with two of the best parents and my work right now is to help other Mamas and Papas with their jobs.  My Mama stays at home and helps me grow, learn and play. My Papa works in San Francisco, California, USA as a telecommunications engineer.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed much, and Kiva provides me a chance to give to others.

lenders.name: Jeff

It is rewarding to follow the progress of the persons receiving the loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs.

lenders.name: Joachim
lenders.loan_because: I want to help someone who is interested in working hard to support themselves.

lenders.occupational_info: i am practising dhamma, at the same time freelancing in graphic design and art direction.

lenders.name: Kanda

lets give each other a helping hand

lenders.name: call me Ed the friend

lenders.name: Chii-Lih
lenders.loan_because: There is no god.

lenders.name: Wolfgang

I am running a small business myself and understand the struggle to stay ahead.

I also know how wonderful and how much fun it can be.

I am still supporting our endeavor with my night job, but wife Diane and I are very optimist that we are on our way and both agreed it is time to share now.
lenders.occupational_info:
We have a fife acre garden with a nursery woven inside. It is so beautiful we host garden tours several times a year.

On the other hand we are still somewhat farmers and still grow a lot of our plants.

My partner and wife consults people on better gardening with a goal to more sustainable suburban front and back yards.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: In honour of my father

lenders.name: Khachik
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach biology (life science) and forensic science at the high school level.

lenders.name: Amy

lenders.occupational_info: I have my own company, Amy J Productions. I work as a theatre technician and teach children's theatre workshops. Learn! Laugh! Play!

lenders.name: J.T.
lenders.loan_because: I can afford to. I have been blessed with more than I need, so I'm just passing along some of the extra to those who have not been as fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a lab. When people donate their organs, I help match the donated organs to people who need them.

lenders.name: David

lenders.name: Shelly

lenders.occupational_info: My industry is: Digital Advertising

lenders.name: good-loaf
lenders.loan_because: Do unto others as you would have them do unto you.

lenders.name: Stephanie

lenders.occupational_info: Originally from the USA, but have been enjoying being an expatriate in Kuwait, Indonesia, and now Australia.

lenders.name: Miki
lenders.loan_because: I like it!

lenders.name: John

lenders.occupational_info: I lead worship and preach and visit the sick and shut in and teach and attend a lot of meetings.

lenders.loan_because: From time to time, I have been extremely grateful for another person's help. If I can help someone better their life, then I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach psychology at a university in Hong Kong, China.

lenders.name: Sofia
lenders.loan_because:
I believe there is goodness in all of us.   As citizens of the world, we have the responsibility to contribute  and learn to share our wealth big or small with one another.   We have the power to change and set an example for today's & future generations...

"TO THE WORLD YOU MAY BE ONE PERSON, BUT TO ONE PERSON YOU MAY BE THE WORLD"......   unknown

lenders.name: ann
lenders.loan_because: I care!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time mother of three amazing children.My husband is a dedicated school teacher. They fill my life with joy.

lenders.name: arualem
lenders.loan_because: “Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others.”

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: It's fun, it's easy, and it makes me feel connected to the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Terence
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better cause than turning people's lives around by enabling them to become self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I just spent the past two years working at CitySquash, a small non-profit organization in the Bronx, NY that teaches urban youth the sport of squash while at the same time helping them with their schoolwork and exposing them to new opportunities.

lenders.name: Wilzelf
lenders.loan_because: I like this kind of help. I think it motivates people to go for it more when they know other people believe in their work.
lenders.occupational_info: Repairing & supporting computer problems, mostly at peoples houses and/or bussinesses.

lenders.name: SUSAN
lenders.loan_because: I needed help to learn to become self-sufficient and I value that for others.

lenders.name: kimiko
lenders.loan_because: I watch many sad news on TV.People kill someone for money ,revenge etc.Everyone has right to live happily.When I come  to this site I feel people's warm heart and love.They just want to help. I just wanted to be one of them.,
lenders.occupational_info: I am teaching  Japanese language to Singaporian.

lenders.name: Hedigers
lenders.loan_because: We believe in this business concept
lenders.occupational_info: I combine my Medical with my business background when consulting public and private sector on healthcare solutions

lenders.name: Tomoko
lenders.loan_because: I believe someone who has hope can make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Wil
lenders.loan_because: God said give abundantly and ye shall receive abundantly.  So I give from the heart not expecting to receive, just knowing the lord has blessed me enough to give reassures me God is giving me abundantly.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a large company with many locations and I am responsible for running the back office for many of the locations.

lenders.name: luc
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: David Watson
lenders.loan_because: it really is better to give than receive

lenders.name: Kate & Colin
lenders.loan_because: My family and I now have more than we need. We believe that anything more than that is only useful if it can help others, as we have been helped when we were in need ourselves.

lenders.name: Judy

lenders.loan_because: There is a need. God blessed me to be in a position to help.

lenders.name: Andrew

lenders.name: Mike & Angie
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: people need a hand in life and if I am able, I will give.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lenders.loan_because: This may help someone in need and is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer programs which is used by many people to do things faster and easily.

lenders.name: Carsten [博思腾]
lenders.loan_because:
b/c "Talent is universal, opportunity is not"
(thx Rye)

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I am embarking on person-to-person loans as a financial hobby, one where I can help others by loaning them money at a modest interest rate.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop online courses and websites for agencies that cannot afford to work with commercial companies.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is my Humanitrian duty to help my fellow man who is willing to help him/her self

lenders.name: Sauro
lenders.loan_because: “Pongo attenzione alle esigenze degli altri, imparo ad ascoltare”

lenders.name: Lynae
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all part of one big community and are meant to help each other. Serving in the Peace Corps and lending on Kiva are the two ways I have chosen to try to make this a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a returned Peace Corps volunteer (RPCV) I served in Ukraine as a community developer.

lenders.name: Jori
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom and I have been blessed with so many things in my life.  It's such an inspiration to see people helping other people to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital to make sure the bills are paid, the employees are paid and provide information to make business decisions.   We are a not-for-profit organization, but we still have to run a smart business so that we can provide healthcare to anyone who walks through the door.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Progress is a great thing to make.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of loaning the money instead of giving it.... it allows the person to feel dignity in achievement and not just hand outs.... this way it allows the person to continue to provide for themselves and their family.. it also fulfills one of the principles of Christ ... and there is nothing better than that...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a landscape designer... placing what God has created in a pleasing way....I  am very familiar with all kinds of plants... I know how to plant seeds, nuture them, patiently wait for growth and then return for a harvest...

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make development work.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies, often large corporations, on how to improve themselves.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and want to give something back to causes and individuals in need.
lenders.occupational_info: graphic artist studying to become an elementary school teacher

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I essentially made myself into who I am today and value the concept of hard work to achieve your dreams. At the age of 25 I now own two homes and have put myself through college. I now want to give back to those that are trying to make a difference and just need a helping hand. Having served 5 years in the US Marine Corps I have visited many different countries and have seen third-world poverty. Any thing that I can do to make a difference in a persons life is my reward!
lenders.occupational_info: I test software and implement/troubleshoot systems for the Dept. of Defense

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: If everyone shares we all prosper

lenders.name: kris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in and pursue helping my brothers and sisters in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise people in need

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: My new business venture is making one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories.  When I see another woman utilizing creativity, available resources and business acumen it resonates and, regardless of which continent she is from, I feel a common bond.
lenders.occupational_info: I make one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories with natural stones, precious metals, vintage charms, and beads handmade from other artists around the world.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference

lenders.name: Scot
lenders.occupation: Writer of fantasy and science fiction
lenders.loan_because: While our technical progess is amazing, a daily wonder, sometimes it is difficult to believe in the progress of humanity.  Kiva allows technology and humanity to walk hand in hand toward a better future.  Bravo, Kiva, and blessings to each and every lender and entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: In my day job, I write marketing copy for web sites.  For fun, fame, and friends, I write stories and novels of science and fantasy fiction.

lenders.name: Kelly and John
lenders.loan_because: Life is short -- live it well.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can and because it is the right thing to do. What better way to take stock of what blessings we have than to make ourselves seek out those who have less and actively take action in helping these people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a service provider to other businesses in Florida, USA. We clean and maintain commercial buildings.
